The criminals found a statue of the king on a panther, broke it, and threw it on the floor, he said. Zahi Hawass added that all of the damage can be restored. Of course he, as anyone who is human would be, is extremely embarrassed by the endless publicity and speculation about what happened many years ago when he was editor of the News of the World. But the David Cameron praised Mr Andy Coulson 's performance in his current role, saying the Downing Street press office worked in a very "proper" way and he had not received a single complaint.
